site.PS: After the website is created, the file owner will be set to [www], you can add your backup plan in

database.TP1: Sync selected database information to server
database.TP2: Sync all database information to server
database.NOT_INSTALL_DATABASE_DESC: 未安装本地数据库，已隐藏无法使用的功能!

config.C3: For security, please change alias, default port, user name and password!
config.CY3: Set a domain name for the panel
config.CY31: Note: You can only use this domain name to access the panel after setting
config.CY41: If IP is set, ONLY the authorized IP can access the panel!
config.CY5: New created site will be saved to subdirectory by default!
config.CY6: Directory of site and database backup!
config.CY7: Default IP is Internet IP. If you need use local virtual machine to test, please input Intranet IP!
config.TEMP_ACCESS_DESC: Temporarily provide panel access to non-admins
config.PASSWORD_EXPIRE_DESC: Set the panel password expiration time
config.NOT_LOGGED_IN_RESPONSE_DESC: Response when not logged in and not properly entered for security entry, can be used to hide panel features
config.SET_IPV6: Allow ipv6 access panel after turning on
config.SET_PANEL_SSL: Click to customize the panel certificate
config.CY13: sec, If the user does not have any operation within
config.CY14: sec, the panel will auto logout
config.CY15: Panel Admin entrance. After setting, you can ONLY log in to the panel through the specified Security Entrance, e.g. /www_bt_cn
config.thread_ps: Unless more than 10 people/sec access the panel, the recommended value should not exceed 2. Note: >1 will cause the BT terminal plugin to be abnormal.
config.BASICAUTH_TIPS2: Add a BasicAuth-based authentication service to the panel to prevent the panel from being swept
config.S_PORT_TIPS: Note: For servers with security groups, please release the new port in the security group in advance.
config.CLOSE_PANEL: Only close the panel, does not affect the operation of web, database, etc.
config.ALLOW_IPV6: Allow panel access via IPv6 address
config.OFFLINE: All services that require internet access will be unavailable
config.DEV_MODE_DESC: Only used by third-party developers in the development stage
config.API_DESC: Enable panel interface access (APP needs to enable this function)
config.SET_SSL: After opening, it can only be accessed through the https
config.BASEAUTH_DESC: Add an extra layer of auth to effectively prevent the panel from being scanned
config.GOOGLE_AUTH_DESC: A dynamic verification code is required to log in to the panel
config.STRONG_PASS_DESC: Enable strong password for the panel, rules:
config.STRONG_PASS_DESC1: Length 8, upper and lower case letters, numbers and characters exist
config.NOTIFY_DESC: After setting, abnormal message can be pushed
config.LOGIN_ALARM_DESC: Every time you log in the panel will push a message to your receiver

close.TITLE: The Panel is closed
close.H1: Sorry, Administrator turned off the Panel
close.P1: Command to turn it on: rm -f /www/server/panel/data/close.pl
close.NAME: aaPanel
close.AUTHENTRY: Please use the correct entry to log in to the panel
close.AUTHERR_REASON_CONTENT: The current aaPanel has turned on the Security Entrance Login. The newly installed machine will randomly assign an 8-digit Security Entrance. It can also be modified at the panel settings. If you have not recorded it or you don't remember it, you can use the following method to resolve the error
close.AUTHERR_RESOLVENT_CONTENT: Enter one of the following commands on the SSH terminal
close.AUTHERR_TACK_CARE: Note: [Turning off Security Entrance] will make your panel login address directly exposed on the Internet, which is very dangerous. Please be cautious.

crontab.PS: Type of task: shell script, backup site, backup database, cut log, free RAM, access URL
crontab.PS1: When adding a backup task, you should run it manually and check if the backup package is complete
crontab.PS2: Insufficient disk space, database password error, network instability, etc. may result in incomplete data backup
crontab.PS3: Support file or directory exclusion when backing up sites and directories. Please upgrade the plug-ins that need to be excluded to the latest version

soft.PS: Upgrade to Pro edition, all plugins, free to use!。

install.TITLE: Initialize BT Software
install.PS1: |Makes it easier to use the server
install.PASS_CANT_EMPTY: Username or password cannot be empty!
install.PASS_NOT_SAME: The passwords entered twice are inconsistent, please re-enter!

login.N12: Verification Code will be displaied after 3 times of login error
login.SCAN_MORE_SAFETY: QR code login is more secure
login.USER_LOGIN: Click on the account to login

menu.HELP: For Support|Suggestions, please visit the aaPanel Forum

layout.tips1: The current IE browser version is too low to display some features, please use another browser. Or if you use a browser developed by a Chinese company, please switch to Extreme Mode!
